pydexpi.loaders.serializer module

class pydexpi.loaders.serializer.JsonSerializer[source]

Bases: object

load(dir_path: Path, filename: str)[source]

Load a DEXPI model from a json file.

Parameters:

  • dir_path (Path) – Directory where the json file is stored.

  • filename (str) – Filename of the json file.

Returns:

Loaded DEXPI model.

Return type:

DexpiModel

save(model: DexpiModel, dir_path: Path, filename: str)[source]

Saves a DEXPI model to json.

Parameters:

  • model (DexpiModel) – DEXPI model that should be saved.

  • dir_path (Path) – Directory where the DEXPI model should be saved.

  • filename (str) – Filename for the saved DEXPI model.

class pydexpi.loaders.serializer.Serializer[source]

Abstract class to (de)serialize DEXPI models.

abstract load(dir_path: Path, filename: str)[source]

Abstract method to load a DEXPI PID data model from a P&ID file.

Parameters:

  • dir_path (Path) – Directory where the P&ID file is stored.

  • filename (str) – Filename of the P&ID file.

Returns:

Loaded DEXPI model.

Return type:

DexpiModel

abstract save(model: DexpiModel, dir_path: Path, filename: str)[source]

Abstract method to save a DEXPI model to a file.

Parameters:

  • model (DexpiModel) – DEXPI model that should be saved.

  • dir_path (Path) – Directory where the DEXPI model should be saved.

  • filename (str) – Filename for the saved DEXPI model.
